ðŸ’¡ Hitomi-Downloader | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Downloading media content from a diverse range of websites through a user-friendly desktop application.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Simple and clear user interface â€¢ Download acceleration â€¢ Supports 24 threads in a single task â€¢ Supports speed limit â€¢ Supports user scripts
ðŸ“– Summary: Hitomi Downloader is a desktop utility designed to download various types of media, including images, videos, and music, from a wide array of websites. It offers advanced features like download acceleration, multi-threading, speed limits, and support for torrents and various video formats.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ Pentaract | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a scalable and cost-effective cloud storage solution by utilizing the Telegram messaging platform as the underlying storage medium, accessible via a REST API.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Unlimited cloud storage using Telegram API â€¢ Minimal server disk space usage â€¢ PostgreSQL database integration â€¢ REST API for backend integration (S3 compatible) â€¢ Dockerized deployment
ðŸ“– Summary: Pentaract is a cloud storage system that leverages the Telegram API for unlimited storage, minimizing server disk space usage. It utilizes PostgreSQL for its database and offers a REST API for integration, aiming for a small application footprint.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ REAL-Video-Enhancer | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Enhancing video quality through AI-powered frame interpolation and upscaling on desktop operating systems.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Cross-platform support (Windows, Linux, macOS) â€¢ Frame interpolation using various AI models (RIFE, GMFSS, IFRNet) â€¢ Video upscaling using various AI models â€¢ Optimized inference with TensorRT and NCNN backends
ðŸ“– Summary: REAL Video Enhancer is a cross-platform application for Linux, Windows, and macOS that provides easy-to-use frame interpolation and video upscaling. It leverages advanced AI models and optimized backends like TensorRT and NCNN for efficient processing, offering features like scene change detection and a real-time preview.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ ShadeOfColor2 | C#
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Hiding arbitrary files within PNG images for secure or restricted data transfer and storage.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Two-way conversion (-crypt to PNG, -decrypt from PNG) â€¢ Embedded metadata (signature, original size, filename, SHA1 hash) â€¢ Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, Linux, macOS) via ImageSharp â€¢ Integrity check for file corruption or tampering
ðŸ“– Summary: ShadeOfColor is a cross-platform C# tool that allows users to hide any file within a PNG image and later recover the original file. It embeds metadata like original file size, name, and a SHA1 hash for integrity checks, making it useful for bypassing email restrictions, cloud storage limitations, or adding a layer of privacy.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ digler | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Forensic disk analysis and deleted file recovery from disk images and raw devices.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Broad Disk Image and Raw Device Support â€¢ File System Agnostic Analysis â€¢ Plugin-Based Extensibility â€¢ Reporting Capabilities (DFXML) â€¢ Post-Scan Data Recovery
ðŸ“– Summary: Digler is a Go-based tool for digital forensics and data recovery, offering both a command-line interface and a desktop application. It specializes in analyzing disk images and raw devices to recover deleted files, even across different file systems, and supports custom file scanners through plugins.
